transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji call aayi thi.
Customer: Good evening sir, Bravo Industries mein baat ho rahi hai meri.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Mai Reena baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se Durgesh ke senior manager.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Actually sir Durgesh se abhi aapka services ke regarding discussion hua tha. To after the discussion aapke paas ek whatsapp pe feedback message aaya hoga like how was your interaction with your account manager kind of right? To waha pe aapne not satisfied diya hai to mai jaan sakti hu sir kya problem aayi hai? IndiaMART services pe bhi diye not satisfied.
Executive: IndiaMART services pe bhi diye not satisfied.
Customer: Nahi nahi I know aapne IndiaMART ke purpose se diya hoga but ye jo not satisfied gaya hai na wo Durgesh ke regarding gaya hai sir. Kyunki aapse Durgesh ne baat ki hai uske uske andar option bhi aaya tha IndiaMART services aur Durgesh ke regarding wo usme IndiaMART services me nahi kiya hai.
Executive: uske uske andar option bhi aaya tha IndiaMART services aur Durgesh ke regarding wo usme IndiaMART services me nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Haan haan lekin kya hota hai na first time agar aapka account manager aapse connect karta hai na 30 days mein one time to waha pe jo bhi feedback jata hai na wo particular aapke account manager ke liye jata hai. Ki usne aapke service ke liye jo aapko guide kiya hai aap usse satisfied ho ya nahi satisfied ho. Bylead inquiry me to IndiaMART satisfied nahi hai usse bhi problem hai.
Executive: Ki usne aapke service ke liye jo aapko guide kiya hai aap usse satisfied ho ya nahi satisfied ho. Bylead inquiry me to IndiaMART satisfied nahi hai usse bhi problem hai.
Customer: Haan wahi wahi cheez hai. Kyunki bylead inquiries ka to rahi baat to sir wo to hum aapka purana record bhi check kar rahe hai ki kahi na kahi aap dissatisfied rahe ho usse pehle bhi. But abhi kya tha na Durgesh se aapki first time baat hui hai jabse usko catalog aapka assign kiya gaya hai. Durgesh se koi problem nahi hai bhai.
Executive: Haan wahi wahi cheez hai. Kyunki bylead inquiries ka to rahi baat to sir wo to hum aapka purana record bhi check kar rahe hai ki kahi na kahi aap dissatisfied rahe ho usse pehle bhi. But abhi kya tha na Durgesh se aapki first time baat hui hai jabse usko catalog aapka assign kiya gaya hai. Durgesh se koi problem nahi hai bhai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai to iska ek concern open ho gaya tha sir thoda sa uske feedback pe fir chala jata hai na Durgesh ke upar. To isme isko mai close kar du sir agar Durgesh ke interaction se koi problem nahi hai to. To aapke paas dobara se aapke paas dobara se ek feedback mil jayega jab mai isko close karungi to. To please aap us pe dobara se ek baar satisfied mark kar dena so that ki haan baki services mein liye Durgesh ne mujhe bataya tha ki ek video meet monday ke liye arrange kiya hai usne.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai to iska ek concern open ho gaya tha sir thoda sa uske feedback pe fir chala jata hai na Durgesh ke upar. To isme isko mai close kar du sir agar Durgesh ke interaction se koi problem nahi hai to. To aapke paas dobara se aapke paas dobara se ek feedback mil jayega jab mai isko close karungi to. To please aap us pe dobara se ek baar satisfied mark kar dena so that ki haan baki services mein liye Durgesh ne mujhe bataya tha ki ek video meet monday ke liye arrange kiya hai usne.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to us pe thoda sa aap aa jana mai bhi join kar lungi us Google meet ko taki ek baar hum dekh sake sir ki main uske regarding wo kya dikhana hai aapne mere ko pehle ye bata do.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to us pe thoda sa aap aa jana mai bhi join kar lungi us Google meet ko taki ek baar hum dekh sake sir ki main uske regarding wo kya dikhana hai aapne mere ko pehle ye bata do.
Customer: Sir services mein hum ye dekh lenge na ki what we can else give you sam aap samjho ki jo cheeze ho sakta hai previous account manager aapko nahi provide kar payenge in terms of services wo ek baar hum dekh lenge kaha pe cheeze lack hui hai.
Executive: Sir services mein hum ye dekh lenge na ki what we can else give you sam aap samjho ki jo cheeze ho sakta hai previous account manager aapko nahi provide kar payenge in terms of services wo ek baar hum dekh lenge kaha pe cheeze lack hui hai.
Customer: Kafi baar aapka account manager aapka kafi baar kiya hua hai sir maturity nahi hai. Problem maturity nahi hai.
Executive: Kafi baar aapka account manager aapka kafi baar kiya hua hai sir maturity nahi hai. Problem maturity nahi hai.
Customer: Maturity ka reason hum dekh rahe hai na ki jo bylead aap consume karte ho un bylead se aapka kya interaction ho raha hai kis type ke lead ko aap pehle pick kar rahe ho ye sari details hum check karenge basically sir. I know ki maturity issue hai kyunki aap active to 100% ho IndiaMART pe usme koi issue nahi hai. But problem ye identify karna hai na ki jis bylead pe aap baat kar rahe ho us buyer pe kitne duration ke andar aapka connectivity ban raha hai. Buyer ka detail kitna updated hai jis lead ko aap pick kar rahe ho. Matlab kitna genuine buyer hai wo sab discussion hum monday ko ek bari kar lenge theek hai sir.
Executive: Maturity ka reason hum dekh rahe hai na ki jo bylead aap consume karte ho un bylead se aapka kya interaction ho raha hai kis type ke lead ko aap pehle pick kar rahe ho ye sari details hum check karenge basically sir. I know ki maturity issue hai kyunki aap active to 100% ho IndiaMART pe usme koi issue nahi hai. But problem ye identify karna hai na ki jis bylead pe aap baat kar rahe ho us buyer pe kitne duration ke andar aapka connectivity ban raha hai. Buyer ka detail kitna updated hai jis lead ko aap pick kar rahe ho. Matlab kitna genuine buyer hai wo sab discussion hum monday ko ek bari kar lenge theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer gave 'not satisfied' feedback for Durgesh.

- Customer has maturity issues with buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified feedback was for account manager.

- Executive offered a video meet to discuss services.

- Executive will check customer's interaction with buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet scheduled for Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, buyleads, maturity, services
